profile_summary:
As a Senior Data Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a robust skill set in **Python**, **Machine Learning**, and **AI**, complemented by expertise in **Deep Learning** and **Large Language Models (LLM)**. I have a strong foundation in **cloud technologies** spanning **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring the deployment of scalable and secure solutions. My background includes leading initiatives in **Cybersecurity** and developing enterprise applications that adhere to strict compliance standards. 
I excel in the design and implementation of machine learning pipelines, leveraging frameworks and tools such as **FastAPI** and **TensorFlow** to serve models within large-scale environments. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience with GPU-accelerated workloads, enhancing performance for computationally intensive tasks. My capabilities are further enriched by a commitment to mentoring team members and fostering effective communication within technical projects.
